properties.class: Human Wizard, Elven Wizard, Dark Wizard

steps.text: Talk to Head Summoner Galatea in Gludin Village.

sub.text: On the Plains of the Lizardmen northwest from the Town of Oren hunt Leto Lizardman Warrior, Leto Lizardman Shaman, Leto Lizardman Overlord, collect Leto Lizardman Amulet  — 30 pcs.
In the Sea of Spores hunt Giant Fungus, collect Red Spore Dust  — 30 pcs.
Near Hunters Village hunt Karul Bugbear, collect Karul Bugbear Totem  — 30 pcs.
In the Ivory Tower Crater hunt Manashen Gargoyle, collect Manashen Shard  — 30 pcs.
In Breka's Stronghold hunt Breka Orc Shaman, Breka Orc Prefect, collect Breka Orc Totem  — 30 pcs.
Near Hardin's Academy hunt Fettered Soul, collect Crimson Bloodstone  — 30 pcs.
Near Hardin's Academy hunt Windsus, collect Windsus Tusk  — 30 pcs.
Go to the Wasteland, hunt Tyrant and Elder Tyrant, until you have Tyrant's Talons  — 30 pcs..
Go to the Gorgon Flower Garden, hunt Wyrm, until you have Wyrm's Fangs  — 30 pcs..
Go to the Ant Nest, hunt Noble Ant and Noble Ant Captain, until you have Noble Ant's Wings  — 30 pcs..

steps.text: Talk to Grocer Lars in the Grocery shop in the Town of Dion. You can remove the list she gave you and talk to her again so she'd give you a new one. Repeat until you get the list you need. List I: On the Plains of the Lizardmen northwest from the Town of Oren hunt Leto Lizardman Warrior, Leto Lizardman Shaman, Leto Lizardman Overlord, collect Leto Lizardman Amulet  — 30 pcs. In the Sea of Spores hunt Giant Fungus, collect Red Spore Dust  — 30 pcs. List II: Near Hunters Village hunt Karul Bugbear, collect Karul Bugbear Totem  — 30 pcs. In the Ivory Tower Crater hunt Manashen Gargoyle, collect Manashen Shard  — 30 pcs. List III: In Breka's Stronghold hunt Breka Orc Shaman, Breka Orc Prefect, collect Breka Orc Totem  — 30 pcs. Near Hardin's Academy hunt Fettered Soul, collect Crimson Bloodstone  — 30 pcs. List IV: Near Hardin's Academy hunt Windsus, collect Windsus Tusk  — 30 pcs. Go to the Wasteland, hunt Tyrant and Elder Tyrant, until you have Tyrant's Talons  — 30 pcs.. List V: Go to the Gorgon Flower Garden, hunt Wyrm, until you have Wyrm's Fangs  — 30 pcs.. Go to the Ant Nest, hunt Noble Ant and Noble Ant Captain, until you have Noble Ant's Wings  — 30 pcs..
Talk to Grocer Lars in the Magic shop in the Town of Dion, get Beginning Arcana  — 2 pcs., repear steps 1-2 until you have Beginning Arcana  — 6 pcs..

Now it's time to fight the summoners in any order. Talk to a summoner and get a 1st Crystal of Starting . Summon your servitor to fight, get a 1st Crystal of Inprogress . The fight begins. Only servitor should fight. If you help your servitor, you get a 1st Crystal of Foul . You can start the fight again. If you lose, you get a 1st Crystal of Defeat . You'll have to get more arcanas. If you win, you get a 1st Crystal of Victory .

sub.text: Defeat quest monster Pako the Cat, and Summoner Almors will give you a Almors' Arcana .

steps.text: Talk to Summoner Almors on the western coast of the Talking Island. Defeat quest monster Pako the Cat, and Summoner Almors will give you a Almors' Arcana .

sub.text: Defeat quest monster Mimi the Cat, and Summoner Basilla will give you a Basillia's Arcana .
Talk to Summoner Celestiel at the Elven Fortress.
Defeat quest monster Phantasm the Unicorn, and Summoner Celestiel will give you a Celestiel's Arcana .

steps.text: Talk to Summoner Basilla at the southern entrance to the Wasteland. Defeat quest monster Mimi the Cat, and Summoner Basilla will give you a Basillia's Arcana . Talk to Summoner Celestiel at the Elven Fortress. Defeat quest monster Phantasm the Unicorn, and Summoner Celestiel will give you a Celestiel's Arcana .

sub.text: Defeat quest monster Shadow Turen, and Summoner Belthus will give you a Belthus' Arcana .

steps.text: Talk to Summoner Belthus located at the entrance to the Cruma Tower. Defeat quest monster Shadow Turen, and Summoner Belthus will give you a Belthus' Arcana .

sub.text: Defeat quest monster Unicorn, and Summoner Camoniell will give you a Camoniell's Arcana .
Talk to Summoner Brynthea to the northeast from the Town of Giran.
Defeat quest monster Silhouette Tilfo, and Summoner Brynthea will give you a Brynthea's Arcana .

steps.text: Talk to Summoner Camoniell to the east from Floran Village. Defeat quest monster Unicorn, and Summoner Camoniell will give you a Camoniell's Arcana . Talk to Summoner Brynthea to the northeast from the Town of Giran. Defeat quest monster Silhouette Tilfo, and Summoner Brynthea will give you a Brynthea's Arcana .
Talk to Head Summoner Galatea in Gludin Village and get the reward.
